text.div:
Varicella (Tests for Varicella zoster virus Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    11483-5 Varicella zoster virus DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    21598-8 Varicella zoster virus DNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection

    35400-1 Varicella zoster virus DNA [Presence] in Tissue by NAA with probe detection

    91791-4 Varicella zoster virus DNA [Presence] in Upper respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
